titles.title: Strong Sentences for Safer D.C. Streets Act of 2025
Strong Sentences for Safer D.C. Streets Act
Strong Sentences for Safer D.C. Streets Act of 2025
To increase the mandatory minimum sentences applicable to certain crimes in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 26 - 19.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 119-326.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 279.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
